item.title: Welcome Letter
item.description: This is my first exercise of website development. I did not intend to build a blogging website. I was reading through the tutorial at codecademy about building a static website. Then it leads me to Jekyll which is a static website generator written in Ruby. In my opinion, Jekyll is a handy and simple framework that would get you started on the way of Web Development. Next, I’m going to refine the styling of this website step by step.
